findings.title: Tests could not be run
findings.description: npm install doesn’t work as-is and there were errors located at hardhat.config.json. Recommendation: Please make sure all tests could be executed and there is a script or description of how to run them.

findings.title: Block timestamp
findings.description: Dangerous usage of block.timestamp. block.timestamp can be manipulated by miners.

findings.title: A public function that could be declared external
findings.description: public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
